R

randomInitialize() - Method in class model.Automata
This method sets up the Automata with 50% dead 50% alive cells.
randomizeGrid() - Method in class controller.MainController
This method randomizes the grid, filling it with 50% alive 50% dead cells.
randomizeGridButton - Variable in class view.GUIFrame
 
reset() - Method in class controller.MainController
This method is used to reset the GUI when the player loads a game or starts a new one by randomizing or clearing the grid.
rows - Variable in class controller.CellPanelGridController
 
run() - Method in class controller.MainController.EvolutionThread
